name: Vorld Decay
description:
"You're lost in a labyrinth of teleporters!

Use power cores (the floating coloured cubes) to power the teleporters and escape!

Use WASD to move, look around with the mouse or the arrow keys.

Use E or left click to pickup and drop cores, and also to place or remove them from the control panels.

You may meet others on your journey."

Vorld decay was made for 7DFPS and proc-jam.

It's multiplayer*, so if you've got friends, grab one (or more) and give them the link too!

* However if the server is down or full it falls back to local single player, so if you don't see them, that's probably why!

The goal of the jam was to create a multiplayer first person puzzle game with procedurally generated puzzles using web technologies.
